entry.title: FILING PERIOD UNDERWAY FOR SPECIAL DISTRICTS ELECTION
entry.summary: February 21, 2025 3:50 a.m. The filing period is underway for the 2023 Special Districts Election. It will take place on May 20th with the deadline to file for candidacy set for March 20th. There are 223 positions open for filing in Douglas County. Elections for Special Districts in Oregon are held every two years,...

entry.title: Elmer’s Returns to Roseburg with New Breakfast & Brunch Location
entry.summary: Elmer’s is returning to Roseburg with a new location at 3030 Northwest Aviation Drive, offering breakfast, brunch, and mimosas. The 4,950 sq. ft. restaurant will feature fan favorites and create 30-40 new jobs. The grand opening is set for late spring or early summer.

entry.title: Welcome to the New Year!
entry.summary: It’s not like 2024 anymore…. In December 2024, one assessment of what to expect for 2025 stated that 2025 would likely resemble 2024, should the U.S. economy not crater and nukes don’t fly. With January not quite complete it is safe to say that the initial assessments of 2025 were wrong and that this is… The post Welcome to the New Year! appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.

entry.title: Two Lives Lost in Avalanche on Trail 8, Deschutes County SAR Recovers Victims
